verbose_text: The activation of caspase-3 and caspase-9 was further enhanced in HUVECs transfected with Ad-shp120ctn, whereas overexpression of p120ctn almost abolished the caspase activation induced by AngII.
evidence: caspase-9 was further enhanced in HUVECs transfected with Ad-shp120ctn, whereas overexpression of p120ctn almost abolished the caspase
